description:
$2,200/mo 2 Bed, 1 Bath, 1 covered carport - Max of 4 occupants. 
Very spacious 1098+ sqft, 1 Bedroom 1 Bathroom apartment (optional extra room). New paint throughout, beautiful hardwood and laminate floor, charming original built-ins in living room and formal dining, beautiful wood framing around windows. Washer/dryer hookups in unit. 

Prime location conveniently close to USC, Exposition Park, home of the Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum, Natural History Museum and the Banc of California stadium. Easy freeway access, and only a few miles from LA Live and the Staples Center, and 10 minutes to Santa Monica Beach or Hollywood

Description:
- 1098 sq. ft.
- 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom 
- Washer/dryer hookup in unit (appliances not included)
- One covered carport parking space included
- Easy access to the 10 & 110 and Exposition Metro Line
- Move-In Ready!

Requirements: 
- Application fee: All adult applicants must complete a Zillow application (includes credit and background check) 
- Proof of Income 2.5x rent (past 3 mos check stubs for all applicants)
- Proof of Assets minimum balance 3x rent (past 3 mos bank statements) 
- Minimum Credit Score: 620 
- 1-year lease
- Renter pays for utilities, except water.
- No pets allowed
- No smoking

Modern contemporary 3 story townhouse style unit (Unit Number 1233). Construction completed in May 2020. Designated, Tandem parking spaces. Stainless steel refrigerator, stove, dishwasher and microwave hood. In unit washer and dryer. All bathrooms have tile enclosures and tile floors. Central air condition and heating. All rooms are en suite. This property is located near USC and a great option for offsite student housing. Close proximity to the metro/metro rail, Korea town, DTLA. Unit is separately metered for water, gas, and electricity. Small private lawn area for this unit in the back. *This unit is different from 1233 1/2 W 39Th Pl.

FIRST TWO WEEKS FREE! Brand new 2 story condo features 3 bed /3 1/2 bath 1850 Sq feet. CONDO IS PERFECT FOR USC STUDENTS The kitchen in this condo is so spacious it's like a dream come true!. Endless Modern countertops and cabinets with chrome Fixtures.Laundry room is located on the first floor next to the bathroom the dining room is very spacious just like the long spacious living room, the condo features a Very modern look and feel starting from the front door all around The bathroom features very modern looking tile step in showers with glass sliding doors. with a very good size vanity mirrors each room has its own bathroom two of the bedrooms have a mirror sliding closet doors and the master has the walk in closet. the bedrooms have carpet flooring.The balcony has a street view and the balcony space is big enough to have a table with chairs to enjoy your the morning coffee and or a glass of wine at the end of the day.very convenient for students or new faculty of U.S.C because we are in free LYFT zone

1 YEAR LEASE 1 MONTH RENT 1MONTH SECURITY DEPOSIT REQURED UPON APPROVAL.

Unique bungalow offers a comfortable one bedroom/one bathroom unit with laminate flooring throughout and no shared walls. Updated refrigerator, stove, and all utilities are included. This controlled-access property is professionally managed and situated in a truly vibrant and youthful neighborhood within walking distance to USC, the Natural History Museum, and the LA Coliseum. With great accessibility to stores, coffee shops, and diverse restaurants in the area, this property also boasts easy accessibility to a variety of public transportation options, such as walkability to the Expo line stop, as well as being central to the 110 and 10 Freeways. On-site parking is available for $100/mo. Contact us today to schedule your private viewing!

Lease is 1 year

This property is improved, updated and repainted throughout. New engineered flooring in all rooms except the bathrooms. The bathrooms have new fixtures, tile and vanities. Air conditioning is plumbed and ready to be connected for the summer! Large backyard with new turf front and back is perfect for family entertaining.  There is plenty of room for car parking via the back alley into the property.

Large, fully remodeled, upstairs 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom unit for rent. Blocks from USC, it is within the USC DPS area. Upgrades include updated flooring, bathroom, kitchen cabinets, counter-top, appliances, etc. Unit includes oven, dishwasher, refrigerator and on site laundry. Street parking only. 1 year lease minimum.

Owner pays water and trash. Tenant responsible for their electricity and their gas. Coin operated washers and dryers in building. Gated. Street parking only. 1 year lease minimum. $30 application fee per adult.

Open House: Sunday April 21, 2024 from 2:00pm - 3:00pm

Cozy Studio down the street from USC Campus. Shared Laundry Room on Site.
Studio has no furniture. Unit is equipped with wall A/C, wall heater, stove, microwave and refrigerator. *Note Refrigerator is left by previous Tenant and Landlord does not provided warranty*.

Shared Laundry Room on site. Street Parking Only.

Landlord pays for Water Only. Tenant is responsible for Electric, Water, Trash & Internet. No Smoking on Site. No Pets. No Parking Space

Newly renovated one bed apartment

Owner pays for trash, water, and sewer. Smoking is not allowed.

USC walking Distance. The Row Apartments is conveniently located at the entrance of the famous Fraternity Row, adjacent to Study Hall, Tram Stop immediately across the street and is patrolled by USC Campus Security.

 

Amenities Included: Hot/Cold Water and Trash, Laundry on premises. Parking Available for a fee, Manager on premises

Landlord pays Water (hot and cold) and Trash. Tenants are responsible to pay for electricity and Internet.

Spacious 3 bedroom, 3 bath apartments located minutes away from the USC campus! 

Three story units, balcony views, attached two car garage (NO ADDITIONAL FEE), 
large closets & private bath in each room. Gated entry. 

All units have smart lock entry, individual climate control in each room, Appliances supplied: washer/dryer, microwave, dishwasher, fridge, stove/oven

Perfect for USC students or professionals who work in the los angeles area! Minutes away from several of Los Angeles' most popular hot spots such as the Crypto.com Arena, Coliseum (USC), Exposition Park, popular restaurants and many more!

This recently remodeled house features hardwood floors, updated appliances in the kitchen and lots of natural light. In unit laundry and a huge back yard make this the perfect house for a family. You are very close to the EXPO line, USC, Downtown, as well as amazing restaurants and shops.

New 2 story, 3 bedrooms 3 bath unit, available for the fall 2024. Fully furnished with tween bed and computer desk. The unit is located across the street from USC main campus.
The unit is also located in the free lift zone and DPS patrol zone. All rooms are equipped with independent AC/heat units. Newer stainless steel kitchen appliances-refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher and gas stove. laminated wood flooring, all bathrooms are remodel including the Kitchen/living room. Bright open space with eight foot ceilings. The House is gated and equipped with automatic gate and 1 parking space included. Washer and dryer in unit. Close to Downtown, Staples center. Welcome to the ultimate student living experience! This exquisitely remodeled 5 bedroom, 5 bathroom apartment is your gateway to the vibrant USC campus and just steps away from Smart and Final, ensuring all your daily needs are at your doorstep.

Step inside and be enchanted by the modern charm and thoughtful design that awaits you. Each spacious bedroom comes fully furnished with a cozy full bedframe, a sleek desk, and a comfortable chair, providing you with the perfect space to study, relax, and call your own.

With five private bathrooms, no need to worry about sharing facilities, offering you the utmost convenience and privacy. Embrace the ease of college living, where everything you desire is right within reach.

Situated in the heart of the action, you'll have unparalleled access to all that USC and the surrounding area has to offer. Whether it's attending classes, exploring the campus, or indulging in the local dining scene, you'll be right in the middle of it all.

Come and experience the epitome of modern student living in this beautifully remodeled 5 bedroom, 5 bathroom apartment. Embrace comfort, convenience, and community all in one place - your perfect USC haven awaits!

Newly Renovated 1 Bedroom Apartment! Handicap friendly bathroom with Doorless shower! Includes Parking Space! Beautifully renovated 1 bedroom/1 bath apartment near USC and the Colosseum. This is great front unit in a small Spanish style building. Bathroom and Kitchen have been newly remodeled. Entire unit has been painted and has brand new flooring. Huge bonus closet in the living area as well as dining space with tons of cabinets for even more storage. Quiet building with monthly pest control very well maintained. This is a beautiful unit and won't last. Section 8 and other housing programs accepted. For more properties like this visit Affordable Housing.

This BRAND NEW 3-story townhome-style 6-unit located around walking distance to Exposition Park and USC campus, and also located in USC's free Lyft zone! It is good opportunity for excellent off-campus student housing. looking for a Corporate Master Lease Tenant or individual renters , There are two separated buildings with ROOFTOP DECKS with amazing city views . Front building offer 2 units which each unit is 3 bedrooms + 3.5 bathrooms, and one ADU which is 1 bedroom +1 bath Rear Building offer three units which each unit is 3 bedroom + 3 bathroom. All units have open floor plan , big windows for more natural light, and microwave, refrigerator , washer & dryer all included in each unit, monthly rent will be $4000 for 3 bedroom units and $1800 for 1 bedroom unit

This small gated building is located within the USC Patrol Zone and only a few blocks from the USC Campus and Exposition Park! It is also centrally located to Downtown LA, Mid-City and the Westside! This adorable apartment home has a beautifully renovated with new cabinets and countertops in the kitchen/bathroom, stainless steel refrigerator/stove/dishwasher, newly installed AC and on-site laundry! This apartment is laid out in a two story townhouse style with the kitchen and living room on the 1st floor and the two bedrooms and bathroom on the 2nd floor, and it comes with one covered/assigned parking space! Apartment has only one shared wall and no neighbors above or below you!

Top Floor end unit Easy access to freeways and downtown. 20 unit building has freshly painted hallways and floors, street parking, laundry down the street. For more properties like this visit Affordable Housing.

**Resident Benefits Package & Renter's Insurance** 
The Resident Benefits Package is REQUIRED with all eLAvate lease agreements. The Resident Benefits Package will be billed monthly as one $40.00 charge as additional rent to include the renters insurance benefit and the payment & services benefit. Residents should consult an insurance professional to evaluate and determine personal insurance needs. Residents who provide proof of their own renter's insurance policy that is lease compliant may opt out of the insurance benefit and $10.00 will be deducted from the monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package. 
 
**Lease Processing Admin Fee** 
eLAvate charges a $150.00 non-refundable lease processing administrative fee for all new leases. This covers our cost for providing the service of preparing your online lease agreement for the convenience of electronic signature and setup in our system. 
 
HOW TO APPLY & RENTAL APPLICATION REQUIREMENTS:
 
*Completed rental application for each prospective resident 18 years of age or older.
*$50 application fee for each application (cash is not accepted).
*Valid government issued photo ID.
*If you are employed: 3 most recent consecutive pay stubs. Partial screenshots, mobile screenshots and monitor screenshots are not accepted. Only full and complete statements are accepted.
*If you are self-employed: All pages of two years recent PERSONAL tax returns
and all pages of three months recent PERSONAL bank statements are required. Partial screenshots, mobile screenshots and monitor screenshots are not accepted. Only full and complete statements are accepted.

*KNOW BEFORE YOU APPLY*
*Please review the Rental application Process & Criteria.
 
Photos in this ad are a representation and may not reflect the actual home that is currently available
 
Professionally managed by eLAvate, Inc.

If applicant(s) make any derogatory or offensive comments in any way shape or form either verbally or written, and/or act in a threatening, combative, intoxicated or disorderly manner, during any phase of the application process and lease process the application may be denied. This also applies if the lease has been signed and applicants have not yet taken possession of the home/unit.
 
Equal Housing Opportunity
 
Every effort is made to provide reliable and accurate information. However, changes can and do take place to cause inaccurate information to be inadvertently presented. eLAvate encourages all applicants to verify schools, allowable pets, expected features, or any and all concerns prior to submitting an application and signing a lease agreement. Any information posted on this advertisement does NOT constitute a written agreement or guarantee of the facts stated.
 
All application fees are NON-REFUNDABLE
